Add Product

PRODUCTS FORM


Looks good!
Name is required Name must be at least 5 characters length
Looks good!
Price is required Price must be at least 100$
Looks good!
Quantity is required Quantity must be at least 5
Looks good!
Discount is required Discount must be Between 5% and 25%
Looks good!
Description is required Description must be at least 4 characters length
